title: Global Third-party Logistics Market Size To Worth USD 2247.95 Billion By 2032 | CAGR of 8.3% - GlobeNewswire
summary: The global third-party logistics market is expected to grow from USD 1,012.75 billion in 2022 to USD 2,247.95 billion by 2032. Asia Pacific is expected to be the fastest-growing region, due to economic growth, a burgeoning e-commerce sector, and expanding manufacturing industries. Major players in the market include BDP International, Burris Logistics, C.H. Robinson Worldwide, and CEVA Logistics.
likely_naics_codes: ['484110 - General Freight Trucking', '485111 - Pipeline Transportation of Crude Oil', '485112 - Pipeline Transportation of Natural Gas', '485113 - Pipeline Transportation of Refined Petroleum Products']
